*** Bug 91799 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Was not able to reproduce it again. Changing the severity to normal and moving 
it to M5.

I do get the same exception from time to time.  It is hard to reproduce. 
Structural changes are being made by someone else holding a reference to the 
HashMap during the lifetime of the iterator in the restoreState.

Part of a mass update. Based on 9/22/2005 development review meeting, it's 
determined this was an open bug/enhancement with tartget mistakenly set to M8. 
Since this will not be in M8, I am changing to "unspecified". 

If this is an error, please correct (for example the bug really has been fixed
in M8, change back to M8, and "fixed".)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 93520 ***
Closing resolved bugs that are WONTFIX, DUPL, or WORKSFORME.
